total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells that are surrounded by the same color on all four sides.
Q2: Determine the color of the surrounding cells.
Q3: Change the color of the identified cells to the color of the surrounding cells, but with a different shade or intensity.
Q4: Apply the same process to all the cells in the grid.
Q5: Ensure that the cells on the border of the grid are not changed.

Q3: Change the color of the identified cells to the color determined in Q2.
